name: Harry G. HAYMAN, III and Robin Hayman, Administrators of the Estate of Gray Bradley Hayman, A Minor, Deceased; Harry G. Hayman, III, and Robin Hayman, in Their Own Right, Appellants v. name_abbreviation: Hayman v. Children's Hospital of Philadelphia

judges: Mr. Justice Nigro did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Harry G. HAYMAN, III and Robin Hayman, Administrators of the Estate of Gray Bradley Hayman, A Minor, Deceased; Harry G. Hayman, III, and Robin Hayman, in Their Own Right, Appellants v. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Mr. Justice Nigro did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
794 A.2d 325
Harry G. HAYMAN, III and Robin Hayman, Administrators of the Estate of Gray Bradley Hayman, A Minor, Deceased; Harry G. Hayman, III, and Robin Hayman, in Their Own Right, Appellants v. CHILDREN’S HOSPITAL OF PHILADELPHIA and John D. Murphy, M.D. and Surgical Associates of Children’s Hospital of Philadelphia, Ltd., Marshall Jacobs, M.D., Yvonne Paris, M.D. and Hitendra Patel, M.D., Appellees

Argued: Oct. 16, 2000.
Decided: Nov. 3, 2000.
